Message 1702 of 4024
So just so you can feel better, I hope?
• When you filed for divorce, we were at 4.0M in "my view" of fidelity.
• After everything done so far, we are at 4.6M in "my view" of fidelity.
So, we have made roughly 1.25M a month since you filed for divorce.
My "panic number" has been 4.2M, but we keep moving the other way.
I manage it pretty closely now, as I have shared, to keep it moving up.

I really have enjoyed the 2nd half our day. In the first half, it was kicking and screaming. But at a point we started to be measured and constructive. It
makes all the difference. It does give me hope that something even beyond civility is possible. Thanks so much.
